messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Relocating to the Chicago area
messages.msgSnippet: ... Huntley is pretty far west of Chicago. If you email HOUSE, they will hook you up with a local group - there s a McHenry county group that s pretty active,
messages.messageBody:
on 4/20/03 9:24 PM, Leslie Avery at ljbakavery@... wrote:

> My
> husbands office would be in Huntley and I assume we
> would locate anywhere west of that area.


Huntley is pretty far west of Chicago. If you email HOUSE, they will hook
you up with a local group - there's a McHenry county group that's pretty
active, I think.

Illinois is homeschool paradise, so far.

Paula, keeping fingers crossed about that one

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Relocating to the Chicago area
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Leslie I m in the southwest suburbs of Chicago, but in Illinois, home schools are considered private schools. No mandatory tests, reports or monitoring.
messages.messageBody:
Hi Leslie
I'm in the southwest suburbs of Chicago, but in Illinois, home schools are considered private schools. No mandatory tests, reports or monitoring. Here's a link that may help you find a support group in the NW suburbs http://www.illinoishouse.org/index.html

K


Our family is possibly looking at a move to the north
western area of Chicago. Leslie

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Relocating to the Chicago area
messages.msgSnippet: Our family is possibly looking at a move to the north western area of Chicago.  Can anyone tell me what the laws and the unschooling climate is in that area.
messages.messageBody:
Our family is possibly looking at a move to the north
western area of Chicago. Can anyone tell me what the
laws and the unschooling climate is in that area. My
husbands office would be in Huntley and I assume we
would locate anywhere west of that area.

Leslie
